reviewText: Brings tears to my eyes. Reminds me of my Marine Corps days.

Think twice before you buy this DVD. It shows only the drill team performing at their Barrack area for those regular tourists. Nothing spectacular. Just like they are practicing or what. The video and audio quality are worse than an old video tape. The DVD contains quite a lot of advertisements to sustain the 45 minutes claimed duration. I feel nothing but being ripped off
I purchased this CD for my husband, a former Marine (but once a Marine, always a Marine) and he said it was terrible.
This video is terrific! It captures the precision of the USMC Silent Drill Team. I love this DVD and the price was fair.
Outstanding video that still gives me chills each time I watch it.  This video will be most enjoyed by Marines and their families.  Once a Marine always a Marine!
